name: Infectious (derHinek)
description:
Entry for Friday Night Game Jam - #2021-6

Controls: WASD or arrow keys

Instructions: Kill enemies by infecting them or let them infect each other. Don't get killed.

Sorry, I totally ran out of time and made only 4 levels. But I think at least the show the basic principles.

Ressources:
Graphics Kenney 1-Bit Pack
Font Minecraft Ten
Color Palette Mini Jam Power Palette

Project is open source: https://github.com/hinek/Infectious
